description:
Elias continues to investigate what is sapping magic from Lucy and Simeon. Chise gets a lecture from Hazel on her lack of self-preservation, and the students volunteer to do some gathering at the waste tower as Hallowe`en arrives.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Small Leak Will Sink a Great Ship. I
